name: Jump Girl
description:
A girl who jumps around and collects some oregano to spice up her life. Also, she loves to make it fast. Can you collect all oregano fast?

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam 31.

The repository in Github can be found in https://github.com/kalebye2/godot-wild-jam-31.

In HTML version it is better to use the main menu with the mouse.

Controls

Arrow keys/D-pad: Move

Up/Z/Joy-A: Jump

Down/C/Joy-R: Dash

Escape/Joy-Pause: Main Menu
